title: Audible Premium Plus is $1/Month for 3 Months With This Holiday Deal
summary: Ahead of holiday travel and gifting season, Amazon Prime is offering three months of access to their premium audiobook site, Audible Premium Plus, at only $.99/month. Once the three months conclude, they’ll begin charging their typical $14.95/month. The deal, which runs from Oct. 1 through Dec. 1, …
